item.title: Behavior Testing for Time Series Forecasting with Prophet
item.description: tl;dr Behavioral testing for time series forecasting models can be used to assess their adaptability to sudden changes in historical data. In this blog post, I am using the Prophet framework to evaluate the model’s response to permanent shocks within a time series. What is behavior testing? Behavior testing is a methodology for evaluating the adaptability of a model to sudden changes in historical data. It is a form of stress testing that simulates shocks within the time series and observes the model’s response.

item.title: Extract Information From PDFs
item.description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) can be used to extract text information from PDF files. In this blog post, I am using the tesseract framework to extract the weekly menu of a takeaway store.
